string-array.name: cueballstrings
string-array.item: Maybe- if you shave your head and apply peanutbutter.
I think that might happen... some day.
Ask when this song is over.
Let me save my game first.
A snowballs chance in hell. Not sure if it\'s the frozen hell or the hot hell tho.
Try again in an hour or ten.
Perhaps you should down another shot and ask again.
The answer is hazy. 5 gold will clear that right up.
Seriously, you\'re better off asking a fortune cookie on that one.
Wax a goat, and it will give you the answer you seek.
gather up 5 hairbands and make a crappy voltron. there you will find your answer.
if wishes were horses you could make a couple cheeseburgers.
my shoe says yes- but just the right one. The left one doesn\'t care.
heh, silly nugget- how should I know?
